mapper.select: WITH recursive cte AS ( SELECT cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef, 1 AS level FROM goods_category WHERE cateCodeRef IS null UNION all SELECT p.cateName, p.cateCode, p.cateCodeRef, 1 + LEVEL AS level FROM goods_category p INNER JOIN cte ON p.cateCodeRef = cte.cateCode ) SELECT cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef, LEVEL FROM cte;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_goods (gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes) VALUES (#{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes});
